situation: J began to scream and hit his desk when a new class horn alarm was tested unexpectedly for fire drill preparedness.
action: Aides quickly enacted a strategy by using calm words and turning down the lights while guiding J to a safe space with weighted blankets. They employed visualization tactics of his favorite calm scene to soothe him.
effect: J gradually settled down, effectively using calming visuals to return to class without sustained agitation.
topic: Sensory Overload Situations - scenarios involving overwhelming sensory inputs like loud noises, bright lights, or crowded spaces
